body_html: What is a lot of memory? It looks like from the log the tensor it is allocating was 148MB? What GPU do you have? How much memory does it have? Does it work if you write checkpoints frequently and restart? That would verify if it is a memory leak. @zheng-xq

body: What is a lot of memory? It looks like from the log the tensor it is allocating was 148MB? What GPU do you have? How much memory does it have? Does it work if you write checkpoints frequently and restart? That would verify if it is a memory leak. @zheng-xq
